p: The extracts with higher inhibitory activity against α-amylase, EES, and MES, behave with an uncompetitive inhibition, since the kinetic analysis of these extracts, produces a family of parallel lines for increasing extracts concentration ( Figures 2(a,b)). The equilibrium constant for binding with the enzyme-substrate complex ( K IS) was calculated from the replotting of the intercepts (1/ V max) versus the inhibitor concentration, resulting in a value of 2.47 and 3.66 µg/mL for EES and MES, respectively ( Table 2).
